dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Infringement - EV1-C1552930M
dmca.body:
This email serves as my written notice to you. This notice is also attached
to this email in both Word and PDF format.

October 30, 2006

To:

Attn: Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel
Everyones Internet
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

Office: (214) 782-7800
FAX:(214) 782-7756
Email: dmca@ev1.net

From:

Clinton S. Clark
7150 Cahill Rd #120
Edina, MN 55439-2041

Home: (319) 504-2932
Email: clint.clark.email@gmail.com


Subject: Claim of Copyright Infringement by www.liveindia.com


Dear Andrea,

My name is Clinton S. Clark and I am the owner and author of the
copy-written work online at www.pianonanny.com, also known as Piano on the
Net. Piano on the Net was established online in February of 1994 and was the
first website on the Internet to teach free online piano and music lessons.
Piano on the Net has won many awards and has been featured on the NBC
Nightly News (June 1998), CNN (October 1997), and in WebMaster (now CIO)
Magazine (August 1997).

A hosting-account customers of Everyones Internet, Swami Rajesh Chopra
(Domain: www.liveindia.com - IP Address: 66.98.156.58),
has stolen copy-written material from Piano on the Net and has published it
online at www.liveindia.com.

Here is a summary of the material he has stolen:

http://www.liveindia.com/piano/index.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/1.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/2.html

Note that throughout, Swami Rajesh Chopra has taken the original graphics
from Piano on the Net and shaded them a different color, possibly in an
attempt to hide their origin.

http://www.liveindia.com/piano/2.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/3.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/4.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/3.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/5.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/7.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/4.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/8.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/9.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/5.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/10.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/11.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/6.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/12.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/13.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/7.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/14.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/15.html


http://www.liveindia.com/piano/8.html

from:

http://www.pianonanny.com/16.html
http://www.pianonanny.com/17.html


I am formally requesting that Everyones Internet remove or disable access to
this stolen work.

Swami Rajesh Chopra can be contacted at:

Attn: Rajesh Chopra
Live India Internet Services
85, Suvidha Kunj, Pok, H-4&5,
Pitampura,
New Delhi, Delhi 110034
IN

+91-9810058383 fax: +91-11-23868383

liveindia@gmail.com
liveindia83@yahoo.com


Your help in this matter would be greatly appreciated.


Thank you.


Sincerely,



Clinton S. Clark


Signed October 30, 2006. This typed signature serves as my signed written
signature.


cc:

Dave Arringdale at The Nanny Group/ ATSAdvice@aol.com
Dan Combs at The Nanny Group/ dan.combs@globalidentitysolutions.com





-- 
Clint Clark

Web Designer /Consultant
The Art Department
www.pianonanny.com/portfolio/
clint.clark.email@gmail.com
(319) 504-2932
